member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_COLOR
member.summary: Defines a color value for Microsoft Direct3D 11 video.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_COLOR.YCbCr
member.summary: A structure that contains a YCbCr color value.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_COLOR.RGBA
member.summary: A structure that contains an RGB color value.
